channel.title: Iamsatoshi on Michael Bumann
channel.description: Recent content in Iamsatoshi on Michael Bumann

item.title: #IamSatoshi - we are all Satoshi
item.description: So there have been again some big media houses publishing stories that they have found Satoshi Nakamoto. This time again for real, really... trust us. The Bitcoin boards on reddit are full of posts about the story. Most of them are very critical and arguing it is a hoax. (wondering why the media companies always fail on that...but that’s a different story) It seems the whole Bitcoin world has no better topic to talk about.
